markdown:
**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 175 2.0 **Prerequisites** [scoundrel racket](/Rackets.aspx?ID=2); [Debilitating Strike](/Classes.aspx?ID=10) --- You learn new debilitations that grant you tactical advantages against your foes. Add the following debilitations to the list you can choose from when you use Debilitating Strike.
  • **Debilitation** The target can’t use reactions.
  • **Debilitation** The target can’t flank or contribute to allies’ flanking.
name: Tactical Debilitations
